subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: N.B.A. veterans who played before 1965 will receive a 50 percent increase in their pensions under the terms of an agreement between the league and the National Basketball Players Association announced Saturday.
snippet: N.B.A. veterans who played before 1965 will receive a 50 percent increase in their pensions under the terms of an agreement between the league and the National Basketball Players Association announced Saturday.
